member.name: T:RegistryUtils.RegistryMonitor
member.summary: RegistryMonitor allows you to monitor specific registry key.
member.remarks:
If a monitored registry key changes, an event is fired. You can subscribe to these events by adding a delegate to .
The Windows API provides a function
RegNotifyChangeKeyValue, which is not covered by the class. imports that function and encapsulates it in a convenient manner.

remarks.p: OnRegChanged is called when the specified registry key has changed.
